We’re proud to be the official smartphone of the #PGATOUR! Will we #SeeYouAtTorrey for the @FarmersInsOpen? Stay tuned in through our Stories for amazing behind-the-scene shots at this exclusive event! #ZTELife #FIO #PGATOUR #Golf #ProGolf #FarmersInsOpen #SeeYouAtTorrey #TorreyPines #TorreyPinesGolf #FIO18 #TorreyBreeze

So much to do, so little time! Luckily, the #AxonM gives you so much to see as well. 
As the official smartphone of the PGA TOUR, the Axon M lets you reach your maximum multitaskability potential. Keep up with the leaderboard and get all the great highlights on two 5.2" screens! #ZTELife #ZTEGolf

Congratulations, @mileswkaplan, you are day 3's winner of the #ZTELife Farmers Insurance Open photo contest! Be sure to pick up your prize from the #ZTEbooth between 7 and 18 fairways at #FIO18! Thank you to everyone else who entered. You still have one more day to win!

Enjoy every moment!

Congrats to @mikescardshop, the first winner of day 4's #ZTELife Farmers Insurance Open. Thanks for showing the ZTE Blue Man a great time at #FIO18! Keep on entering with the #ZTELife hashtag! @mikescardshop, be sure to pick up your prize from the #ZTEbooth between 7 and 18 fairways!

Congratulations to @erikamimistyle, today's second winner of the #ZTELife Farmers Open Insurance photo contest, and to our great runner ups! @erikamimistyle, be sure to claim your prize at the ZTE booth, located between 7 and 18 fairways. #FIO18 #PGATOUR #SeeYouAtTorrey

Congratulations to @ridealuxe, our final winner of day 4's #ZTELife Farmers Open Insurance photo contest.  @ridealuxe, be sure to claim your prize at the ZTE booth between 7 and 18 fairways at #FIO18. Thank you to all of our wonderful photo entries! #ZTELife #PGATOUR

A fight has broken out at the #ZTEBooth over our autographed @dannygolf0724 pin flag! Hurry on over to break up the madness and take the flag home for yourself. First person here to ask for it wins it! #FIO18 #PGATOUR #ZTELife
Thanks for joining us at the @FarmersInsOpen this week! Congrats to all of our #ZTELife winners and runner-ups that shared their awesome photos! #FIO18 #PGATOUR

Our tricked-out truck was a big hit here - folks could hardly get enough of our sweet tech, like the #AxonPhone and its HiFi audio! It was a big weekend for the #ZTEtour crew!
We hit the Big Apple last Friday to hang out in Madison Square Garden for a night of giving, NBA legends and a #Knicks victory! Then, we headed down to Virginia on Sunday to meet our fans in Newport News. There was a great turnout - competitiveness among the truck guests with the 'Name that Tune' game was fierce, but fun!

Next, we have a few days off to chill after all the hype. We'll be back in Atlanta today through the 13th with more #tech and Axon giveaways! See link in bio for details!
